## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4022d6e9ad567de4e27943e9f7b877b7f4fc8ad0dc9e8c9dcf81738af56bc2a2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dh-io-globalelem/footnote-component' @ 5.990.10 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
